page.title: 14THE SCHOOL.THE YOUTH CLUB
page.content: use the Youth Club for PE, games, dancing and parties. The Youth Club meets on a Wednesday evening for snooker, darts, table tennis, music and dancing. There is a carpet bowls club which meets every week, and other activities include dances, discos, parties, whist drives and concerts. There is a small kitchen, so meals and snacks can be served. The local produce and flower show is held in the hall, when cream teas are served. Sporting activities include football, cricket and hockey clubs. The sports ground is at Muggintonlane End, in the N.W. of our area. Adult Education sessions are arranged in the evenings. Dancing classes are held in the Youth Club, yoga, flower arranging, egg decorating, doll dressing and computer club sessions are held |cont]
